de.tum.in.tumcampus.models.managers

Class CardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.models.managers.CardManager

  • public class CardManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Card manager, manages inserting, dismissing, updating and displaying of cards

      • update

        public static void update(android.content.Context context)
        Refreshes or initialises all cards. WARNING: Must not be called from UI thread. HOWTO ADD A NEW CARD: 1. Let the manager class implement Card.ProvidesCard 2. Create a new class extending Card 3. Implement the getCardView method in this class 4. Create a new instance of this card in the Card.ProvidesCard.onRequestCard(android.content.Context) method of the manager 5. Add this card to the CardManager by calling Card.apply() from Card.ProvidesCard.onRequestCard(android.content.Context) 6. Add an instance of the manager class to the managers list below

      • insert

        public static void insert(int position,
          Card item)
        Inserts a card into the list
        Parameters:
        position - Position where the card should be inserted
        item - Card to be inserted

      • remove

        public static Card remove(int position)
        Removes card from the list
        Parameters:
        position - Index of the card to delete
        Returns:
        The removed card object

      • restoreCards

        public static void restoreCards()
        Resets dismiss settings for all cards
